sen.j: 新撰万葉集（しんせんまんようしゅう）は、私撰の歌集。
sen.e: Shinsen Manyoshu is a personal collection of poetries.
Shinsen Manyoshu is a personal collection of poetries.
Shinsen Manyoshu is a personal collection of poetries.
It consists of a two-volume book or two books.
It consists of a two-volume book or two books.
It consists of a two-volume book or two books.
The poetries were said to be selected by SUGAWARA no Michizane.
The poetries were said to be selected by SUGAWARA no Michizane.
The poetries were said to be selected by SUGAWARA no Michizane.

sen.j: ただし下巻は別人の撰という。
sen.e: Volume Two was however said to be compiled by another person.
Volume Two was however said to be compiled by another person.
Volume Two was however said to be compiled by another person.

sen.j: 上巻には寛平5年（893年）9月25日、下巻には延喜13年（913年）8月21日の序がある。
sen.e: Volume one has a preface dated November 11, 893 and volume two dated September 28, 913.
Volume one has a preface dated November 11, 893 and volume two dated September 28, 913.
Volume one has a preface dated November 11, 893 and volume two dated September 28, 913.

sen.j: 寛平御時后宮歌合、是貞親王家の歌合中の歌その他242首を真名で書き、左傍に七言絶句を配する。
sen.e: 242 poems including those used in Kanpyo no ontoki kisai no miya no utaawase (Poetry Contest Held by the Consort in the Kanpyo Era) and Koresada Shinno-ke Utaawase (Poetry contest sponsored by the family of Imperial Prince Koresada) were written with the Chinese characters, and shichigon zekku (a Chinese poem of four lines, each of seven characters) was placed on the left.

242 poems including those used in Kanpyo no ontoki kisai no miya no utaawase (Poetry Contest Held by the Consort in the Kanpyo Era) and Koresada Shinno-ke Utaawase (Poetry contest sponsored by the family of Imperial Prince Koresada) were written with the Chinese characters, and shichigon zekku (a Chinese poem of four lines, each of seven characters) was placed on the left.

242 poems including those used in Kanpyo no ontoki kisai no miya no utaawase (Poetry Contest Held by the Consort in the Kanpyo Era) and Koresada Shinno-ke Utaawase (Poetry contest sponsored by the family of Imperial Prince Koresada) were written with the Chinese characters, and shichigon zekku (a Chinese poem of four lines, each of seven characters) was placed on the left.

sen.j: 上巻は四季、恋、下巻は四季、恋、女郎花（女郎花は載せない本がある）。
sen.e: Volume one contains poetries on the four seasons and love, and volume two contains poetries on the four seasons, love, and partinia (flower) (although some editions don't include the part of partinia).

Volume one contains poetries on the four seasons and love, and volume two contains poetries on the four seasons, love, and partinia (flower) (although some editions don't include the part of partinia).

Volume one contains poetries on the four seasons and love, and volume two contains poetries on the four seasons, love, and partinia (flower) (although some editions don't include the part of partinia).

sen.j: 万葉集から古今和歌集までの間の唯一の撰集。
sen.e: This is the only collection of poetry in the period between Manyoshu (the first major anthology of early Japanese poetry) and Kokin Wakashu (A Collection of Ancient and Modern Japanese Poetry).
